name: Target
about: Save an average of $6 with 50 coupon codes & deals for target.com. Target mixes the best of both worlds, offering chic and trendy styles at affordable prices. Popular products include clothing and shoes from their exclusive designer partners, electronics, the hottest toys and home furnishings and decor. And with Target coupons, get 10% off or receive Target free shipping offers for extra savings on your next purchase.
